XIII.i.7.B.1.a
.
Each RLC’s Jurisdiction and Addresses
The
Regional Loan Center’s (RLC's) webpage
can be used to locate the toll-free number and determine each RLC's
jurisdiction, and
mailing and e-mail addresses
.
title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 7, Section B - Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) Pension-Related Home Loans
citation: Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 7, Section B
